item.title: Chessmaster 3-D – PlayStation 1
item.dc:creator: webmaster
item.description:
Price:8.99
Huge selection of new & used video games. Great deals. Free shipping on all orders. 30-day money-back guarantee. We have everything from Atari to PS4. Item specifics Condition: Good: An item in used but good condition. May have minor damage to jewel case including scuffs or cracks, Platform: Sony PlayStation 1 Rating: E – Everyone Release Year: 1996 Genre: Board Games MPN: 024294121937 Game Name: Chessmaster 3-D UPC: 024294121937 Chessmaster 3-D (Sony PlayStation 1, 1996) — FREE SHIPPING!! Detailed item info Product Information Based on the popular computer chess program, The Chessmaster 3-D for the PlayStation allows players to challenge a friend or one of 12 virtual chess opponents. Each computer-controlled opponent is rated according to ability. There are also six unique chess sets (each with animated pieces) from which to choose, including Alphabet, Celestial, Deco, Mechanical, Modern, and Staunton. If you need assistance in deciding which pieces to move in order to secure a checkmate, the ChessMaster is available to lend a helping hand. You can perfect your chess playing skills using various teaching options; you can even view the computer’s thought process as it “thinks” through each move. While this is obviously a 3D title, you can switch the camera angle for a more traditional two-dimensional perspective. The camera is adjustable in that you’re able to zoom it in and out until you find a view that is to your liking. You can even switch playing sides (from black to white pieces or vise versa) or simply have a quick look at the other side of the board. If you want to see which pieces have been captured, you can view them in the War Room. The Chessmaster 3-D also features various time controls (five seconds per move, 40 moves in 120 minutes), replays, take back options, and auto play (which lets the game play itself). Product Highlights Video Product Identifiers Publisher Mindscape Game Chessmaster 3-D UPC 024294121937 Key Features Platform Sony PlayStation 1 ESRB Rating E – Everyone Genre Board Games Location USA Tech Details Control Elements Gamepad/Joystick Number of Players 1-2 Release Year 1996 Game Special Features Challenge the computer or a friend on a 3D table with adjustable levels of zoom Features 12 computer AI opponents Access hints while playing and view replays of key moves Game Series Chessmaster Series View on eBay

The post Chessmaster 3-D – PlayStation 1 appeared first on Video Game Warehouse.

Chessmaster 3-D (Sony PlayStation 1, 1996) — FREE SHIPPING!!

Detailed item info

Product Information
Based on the popular computer chess program, The Chessmaster 3-D for the PlayStation allows players to challenge a friend or one of 12 virtual chess opponents. Each computer-controlled opponent is rated according to ability. There are also six unique chess sets (each with animated pieces) from which to choose, including Alphabet, Celestial, Deco, Mechanical, Modern, and Staunton.

If you need assistance in deciding which pieces to move in order to secure a checkmate, the ChessMaster is available to lend a helping hand. You can perfect your chess playing skills using various teaching options; you can even view the computer’s thought process as it “thinks” through each move.

While this is obviously a 3D title, you can switch the camera angle for a more traditional two-dimensional perspective. The camera is adjustable in that you’re able to zoom it in and out until you find a view that is to your liking. You can even switch playing sides (from black to white pieces or vise versa) or simply have a quick look at the other side of the board.

If you want to see which pieces have been captured, you can view them in the War Room. The Chessmaster 3-D also features various time controls (five seconds per move, 40 moves in 120 minutes), replays, take back options, and auto play (which lets the game play itself).

item.title: Andretti Racing – PlayStation 1
item.dc:creator: webmaster
item.description:
Price:7.99
Huge selection of new & used video games. Great deals. Free shipping on all orders. 30-day money-back guarantee. We have everything from Atari to PS4. Item specifics Condition: Good: An item in used but good condition. May have minor damage to jewel case including scuffs or cracks, Platform: Sony PlayStation 1 Rating: E – Everyone Release Year: 1996 Genre: Racing MPN: 014633074390 Game Name: Andretti Racing UPC: 014633074390 Andretti Racing (Sony PlayStation 1, 1996) — FREE SHIPPING!! Detailed item info Product Information Strap yourself in and crank up the engine, Andretti Racing brings the thrills and spills of stock car and Formula-1 racing to the PlayStation! Depending on personal preference, players now have the opportunity to drive around circular tracks in a NASCAR fashion or race at breakneck speeds in an Indy car circuit. Andretti Racing comes with a variety of options including the Exhibition Race, Career, Versus, and Racing School gameplay modes. The Exhibition Race is simply a single race using either racing type. It is designed to not only save players the hassle of starting an actual Career mode, but to get them accustomed to the various racing controls. In addition to this practice of sorts, new players interested in mastering or learning the sport should check out the Racing School. Featuring the help of Mario Andretti, Michael Andretti, and Jeff Andretti, the Racing School is a series of instructional videos that outlines the sport and gives inside information on how individual Formula-1 and stock cars are put together. When you’re ready to tackle a full season of racing, the Career mode throws you into the mix of either racing circuit. After registering your name and selecting your vehicle of choice, you’ll enter a ten-week season of fierce competition. Not only is the competition designed and taken from real-life racecar drivers, each opponent features realistic AI. These guys are at the top of their game…are you? The season will take players through realistically modeled locations including the Calder Park Thunderdome, Vallejo Speedway, Grand Rapids Motorsports Complex, and the Oceanside International Raceway; track schedules and locations differ between racing types. Each track differs in its own unique way (distances, laps) requiring practice and skill to learn and memorize. If you’re being lapped and coming in last place, it’s time to adjust the dynamics of your vehicle! Andretti Racing allows players to customize car transmissions, select from a variety of tires including soft and slicks, adjust the front/rear wing and downforce velocities, and change gear ratios. By customizing your vehicle to optimum performance, you’ll have better control and consequently finish higher up in the leader board. Additionally, Andretti Racing features the first ever PlayStation split-screen mode with a link cable compatibility; up to four players can play via two consoles! It also comes with a variety of damage, control, and in-game camera options. Product Highlights Video Product Identifiers Publisher EA Sports Game Andretti Racing MPN 014633074390 UPC 014633074390, 5030935010473 Key Features Platform Sony PlayStation 1 ESRB Rating E – Everyone Genre Racing Location USA Tech Details Control Elements Gamepad/Joystick Number of Players 1-2 Release Year 1996 Game Special Features Race Indy and Stock cars on 16 tracks Race head-to-head via splitscreen against three other drivers View video interviews of the Andretti brothers View on eBay

The post Andretti Racing – PlayStation 1 appeared first on Video Game Warehouse.
